DescriptionMain: In this step, you can create a new project by submitting basic release information for the system. Required fields are indicated with an
DescriptionSub: This section must be completed by selecting the 'Save & Continue' button below.
ProjectTitleMessage: Enter a title for your project here. It may consist of any letter, number or symbol from 0-255 characters in length.
ArtistMessage: Enter the artist for your project here. It may consist of any letter, number or symbol from 0-255 characters in length.
ProjectTypeMessage: Select a project type for your project. This can help you differentiate and identify projects with similar titles.
ReleasingLabelMessage: Please select the releasing label for your project. If you only have access to a single label, your label will be pre-loaded and not require a selection.
ReleaseDateMessage: Projects with a release date prior to today's date will be considered post-release. If the project's release date is to be determined, select TBD.
